Scion’s Sanction.name: Scion’s Sanction
Scion’s Sanction.fullText:
Scion of Sacrifice Attack 11Scion’s Sanction

You lash out against foes around you and dare them to strike back.

Encounter        Divine, Weapon
Standard Action      Close burst 1

Effect: Before the attack, you can take damage equal to your level, which can’t be reduced in any way. If you do so, the attack deals 2[W] extra damage.

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Charisma vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

Effect: Each target is subject to your divine sanction until the start of your next turn.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 104.
Scion’s Sanction.flavor: You lash out against foes around you and dare them to strike back.
Scion’s Sanction.range:
Close burst 1

Effect: Before the attack, you can take damage equal to your level, which can’t be reduced in any way. If you do so, the attack deals 2[W] extra damage.

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Charisma vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

Effect: Each target is subject to your divine sanction until the start of your next turn.
Scion’s Sanction.effect: Each target is subject to your divine sanction until the start of your next turn.

Scion’s Healing.name: Scion’s Healing
Scion’s Healing.fullText:
Scion of Sacrifice Utility 12Scion’s Healing

You offer up part of your life force to restore your wounded ally.

Daily        Divine, Healing
Minor Action      Close burst 10

Target: One ally in the burst

Effect: You take damage equal to your level, which can’t be reduced in any way. The target regains hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 104.
Scion’s Healing.flavor: You offer up part of your life force to restore your wounded ally.
Scion’s Healing.range:
Close burst 10

Target: One ally in the burst

Effect: You take damage equal to your level, which can’t be reduced in any way. The target regains hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.
Scion’s Healing.effect: You take damage equal to your level, which can’t be reduced in any way. The target regains hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

Punishing Flame.name: Punishing Flame
Punishing Flame.fullText:
Scion of Sacrifice Attack 20Punishing Flame

Divine flames flood over you, consuming nearby foes in a pyre of retribution.

Daily        Divine, Fire, Implement
Standard Action      Close burst 3

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Charisma vs. Reflex

Hit: 5d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, when any enemy within 5 squares of you deals damage (not ongoing damage) to any ally, that enemy takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 104.
Punishing Flame.flavor: Divine flames flood over you, consuming nearby foes in a pyre of retribution.
